title: Markdown Insert Content
description: Settings for markdown content insertion extension

tocCaption.title: Table of Contents Caption
tocCaption.description: Markdown content to insert before TOC (can be heading like '## Contents', plain text, or any markdown)

tocMaxLevel.title: Maximum TOC Heading Level
tocMaxLevel.description: Maximum heading level to include in TOC (1-6, where 1=h1, 2=h2, etc.)

numberingMaxLevel.title: Maximum Numbering Level
numberingMaxLevel.description: Maximum heading level to apply hierarchical numbering (1-6, where 1=h1, 2=h2, etc.)

numberingTrailingDot.title: Trailing Dot in Numbering
numberingTrailingDot.description: Add trailing dot after heading numbers (e.g., '1.2.' vs '1.2')
